### **Welcome**

Welcome to the 2nd **[Machine Learning and Global Health (MLGH) Network](https://mlgh.net/){target="_blank"}** in-person meeting of 2025, this time in the **[University of Southampton (UoS)](https://www.southampton.ac.uk/about/faculties-schools-departments/school-of-mathematical-sciences){target="_blank"}**! Below you will find key details about the venue, how to get there, and the programme.

If you need any help or get lost, feel free to message me on Zulip (`@André Victor Ribeiro Amaral`). Alternatively, I’ve shared my phone number in the `MLGH UK Workshop` channel.

<div style="margin-top: -40px"></div>

<br />

### **Venue and Information**{#venue}

Below are the logistics for the day, including where to go and how to get there. :grinning: 

#### Meeting Details
:calendar: **Date:** Wednesday, July 2nd, 2025  
:clock10: **Time:** 10:30 AM to 4:30 PM  
:round_pushpin: **Location:** Room 32/2097, University of Southampton (Highfield Campus)

#### Getting There  
- From **Southampton Airport Parkway station**: Take the [**U1C**](https://maps.app.goo.gl/W94eYcmEhEpQGHyX6){target="_blank"} bus to Building 32 (approx. 15 minutes).
- From **Southampton Central station**: Take the [**U1A**](https://maps.app.goo.gl/FeLCKLUVg6ErZ4rcA){target="_blank"} bus to Building 32 (approx. 30 minutes).

<div style="margin-top: 30px"></div>

<iframe src="https://maps.southampton.ac.uk/#17/50.93697/-1.39610" style="border: 0; width: 100%; height: 350px; overflow: auto;"></iframe>

From **4:30 PM**, we will take a walk through **[Southampton Common](https://maps.app.goo.gl/Be7GxF3VzKbWyJMF9){target="_blank"}** and optionally stop for a drink at [The Cowherds](https://maps.app.goo.gl/8AysjtvWbdRPGz9y7){target="_blank"} pub (at your own expense).

<div style="margin-top: -15px"></div>

<br />
